header.title: Share Your Feedback
header.description: Help us improve Whatsgonow by sharing your experience
header.submitted_description: Thank you for helping us improve Whatsgonow!

form.type_label: What type of feedback do you have?
form.feedback_placeholder: Share your thoughts, ideas, or issues with us...

pre_register.title: Join whatsgonow when we launch!
pre_register.subtitle: Register now for the waiting list and be one of the first to use whatsgonow.
pre_register.heading: Pre-registration
pre_register.gdpr_consent: I agree to the processing of my data according to the privacy policy

success.title: Pre-registration successful!
success.description: Thank you for your interest in whatsgonow. We have sent you a confirmation email (if technically possible).
success.confirm_notice: Please click on the confirmation link in this email to activate your access.
success.login_notice: After that, you can log in anytime!
success.spam_notice: If the email does not arrive, check your spam folder or try again later.

errors.gdpr_required: Please agree to the privacy policy
errors.vehicle_required: Please select at least one vehicle size
errors.registration_failed: Registration failed. Please try again later.

hero.title: Share your journey, connect people
hero.description: Whatsgonow is the platform that connects contractors and mobile drivers for spontaneous and plannable transports.

how_it_works.title: How Whatsgonow works
how_it_works.description: A simple way to organize transport and reduce empty trips

step1.title: Register shipment
step1.description: Specify what you want to transport and where it should go.

step2.title: Find driver
step2.description: Find drivers who are already planning a trip on your route.

step3.title: Close deal
step3.description: Negotiate the price and conclude the deal.

step4.title: Transport completed
step4.description: The driver picks up your package and delivers it to the destination.

benefits.title: Benefits of Whatsgonow
benefits.description: Whatsgonow brings many benefits for contractors and drivers

time_saving.title: Time saving
time_saving.description: Save time through efficient delivery and easy arrangement

cost_saving.title: Cost saving
cost_saving.description: Reduce transport costs and create additional sources of income

environmentally_friendly.title: Environmentally friendly
environmentally_friendly.description: Fewer empty journeys mean fewer CO₂ emissions

security.title: Security
security.description: Verified profiles and rating system for more safety

flexibility.title: Flexibility
flexibility.description: Plan transports spontaneously or in advance according to your needs

community.title: Community
community.description: Become part of a growing community of drivers and contractors

user_groups.title: Who is Whatsgonow for?
user_groups.description: Whatsgonow is for anyone who wants to transport goods or offer transport capacity

private.title: Private customers
private.description: You want to have something transported and are looking for an affordable and reliable solution?

business.title: Business customers
business.description: You need regular transports for your company and want to optimize costs?

driver.title: Drivers
driver.description: You are on the road and want to use your journey to earn extra money?

cm.title: Community Managers
cm.description: You want to advance Whatsgonow in your region as a Community Manager?

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.description: Experiences from customers and drivers on Whatsgonow

testimonial1.text: I urgently needed help transporting a wardrobe. Through whatsgonow I quickly found a driver who was heading in my direction. Super easy and cost-effective!
testimonial1.name: Marie Schmidt

testimonial2.text: As a driver, I now use my journeys productively and earn additional money. The app is intuitive and the process is uncomplicated.
testimonial2.name: Thomas Becker

testimonial3.text: Whatsgonow is perfect for our small business. We save on delivery costs while supporting the local community.
testimonial3.name: Laura Müller

cta.title: Ready for more efficient transport?
cta.description: Register now with whatsgonow and discover how easily you can organize transport or earn money as a driver.
